questions.title: What services do you provide?
questions.answer: We currently offer the ability to generate mcq questions from a given topic or extract questions from a PDF.

questions.title: Do I need an account to use the Question Generator?
questions.answer: Yes, you need to register an account to access the Question Generator.

questions.title: Dose we get free Token?
questions.answer: yes after registering you will get 10 free token.

questions.title: What is the cost of generating a question paper?
questions.answer: Generating questions from a topic costs 1 token, while generating questions from a PDF costs 5 tokens.
